specialties: Family or General Practice, Obstetrics and Gynecology
mission_comments: 40 bed hospital with full-time Haitian doctor, 2 Cuban GPs and 2 Haitian residents. Looking for missionary general surgeon. Basic ultrasound for OB, basic labs and xray too.
charges_to_patients: Emergency care is provided to those who need it regardless of ability to pay. Elective surgery is paid in advance. If a patient is unable to pay for medications or services there is a fund to help them with their care.

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice, General Surgery, Optometry, Orthopedics, Radiology, Urology
mission_comments: Comprehensive medical ministry serves the local population as well as those in remote areas. The medical staff operates a 100 bed full service hospital and tuberculosis sanitarium as well as outpatient clinics. Services include laboratory, radiology, surgery, dental, and optometry programs. Orthopedist and urologist come regularly 4 times a month, also perform surgery. PLASTIC SURGEONS NEEDED. Visiting teams welcome; prefer that they bring anesthesiologists.
charges_to_patients: Unknown

specialties: Anesthesiology, Emergency Medicine, Infectious Disease, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics
mission_comments: This 70 year old hospital is open 24/7 and sees any and all patients. Services include: Maternity, Pediatric, Surgery, Internal Medicine, and Infectious Disease. Beraca Medical Center manages HIV/AIDS, tracks and treats TB, and raises community health awareness.
location_information: ['Beraca Medical Center', 'La Pointe des PalmistesPort de Paix', 'Port-de-Paix', 'Nord-Ouest', 'Haiti']

specialties: Dentistry, Nurse Practitioner
mission_comments: Haitian Christians presently staff the Bethesda Medical and Dental Center. Originally trained by OMS missionaries, the full-time personnel treat over 30,000 patients at the medical clinic and 5,000 at the dental clinic yearly. In addition, retired missionaries and medical/dental professionals assist the nationals on a part-time volunteer basis. The medical clinic also operates prenatal and well-baby programs that assist over 4,000 mothers and babies a year.

specialties: Family or General Practice
mission_comments: 5 days a week with a doctor, registered nurse, nurses aides, medical technicians, and pharmacists. Several times a year, doctors from U.S. have specialized clinics, such as OB-GYN or family medicine.

specialties: Family or General Practice, Nurse Practitioner, Vaccinations
mission_comments: Key programs include prenatal care and childhood immunizations. Haitian staff includes physician, nurse practitioner, pharmacist
charges_to_patients: None.
location_information: ['Blanchard (Terre Noire) Family Health Center', 'SEE DESTINATION UNDER PORT-AU-PRINCE(BLANCHARD)', 'Port-au-Prince (Blanchard)', 'Ouest', 'Haiti']

specialties: Ophthalmology, Optometry
mission_comments: Full-time clinic for eye surgery and disease. Full-scale optical lab to provide eye glasses. Addresses issues of cataract surgery, glaucoma, poor eyesight and blindness throughout northern Haiti.
charges_to_patients: Everyone receives treatment regardless of their financial situation.

organization: CRUDEM (Center for Rural Development of Milot)
specialties: Anesthesiology, Family or General Practice, HIV Treatment, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics

mission_comments: This is a full-time mission with availablity of family practice, Internal Medicine, OB-GYN, and Pediatrics year-round. Refer patients to: Mr. Raymond Delnatus,
charges_to_patients: A nominal fee is charged. call Msr Delnatus on his cell phone (3782-6823) for fee reduction requests due to financial hardship. Children up to age 5 are treated for no charge.

specialties: Family or General Practice, Family planning services, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics, Vaccinations
mission_comments: Centre Medico Social clinic services include routine primary and pediatric care, routine gynecological care, family planning, treatment of sexually transmitted diseases and pre/post natal care. In addition, there are laboratory and pharmacy services on site.
location_information: ['Centre Medico Social Nord Alexis', '76 Ruelle Nord Alexis', 'Limonade', 'Nord-Ouest', 'Haiti']

specialties: Orthopedics, Pediatric Surgery, Physical Therapy, Rehabilitation Medicine
mission_comments: The mission of PAZAPA is to support the treatment, education, and development of children with handicaps, and to integrate them into the community at large.
charges_to_patients: Complete coverage of surgical and other associated costs ensures that every child seen at the center or at one of the rural outreach clinics is eligible for treatment.

specialties: Orthotist, Physical Therapy, Prosthetic Services, Rehabilitation Medicine
mission_comments: Advantage Haiti serves the needs of those with disabling conditions through the Rehabilitation Clinic & the Prosthetics / Orthotics Shop at the Cayes Clinic in Les Cayes, The Bernice Johnson Center (vocational training program for women with disabilities and--starting in May 2010--rehabilitation clinic that can house persons who need to stay in the area for short or longer term rehabilitation. The Rehabilitation Brace Shop is equipped to fabricate custom orthotics. Other programs include those for Blindness and Low Vision and School Sponsorships.
charges_to_patients: None.

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics, Prosthetic Services
mission_comments: Outpatient clinic and 60 bed hospital. Rehabilitation Clinic and Prosthetics / Orthotics Shop operates within Cayes Clinic/Hospital. inpatient and outpatient services are offered during the hours of operation of CSL. Referrals are received primarily through the doctors of CSL and H
charges_to_patients: None.

specialties: Family or General Practice
location_information: ['Centro de Medico', 'St. James Parish                   Plaine du Nord', 'Plaine du Nord', 'Artibonite', 'Haiti']

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice
mission_comments: small clinic sees about 120 patients a day (2 Haitian docs, 1 American FP and PA) . We do allow very small groups with internists, pediatricians, family practice, nurse practitioners, and physician assistants. At most we can provide an exam room for 1 care giver and can find places for 2-3 nurses or a lab tech/X-ray tech/ or sonographer. We do minor surgery (lumps,bumps, biopsies) and set non complicated fractures. We do not deliver babies. The dental clinic has an orthodontist that arrives every month for about 3 days. See separate listing for Christianville Eye Clinic

organization: Christian Vision Eye Services to Haiti
specialties: Optometry
mission_comments: We specialize in medical glaucoma treatment. We make eyeglasses in-house although our frame selection is at times limited. We stock all prescribed medicines at prices significantly below what patients will pay elsewhere. All patients receive essential medicines regardless of their ability to pay, to the best of our ability. We do not have surgical facilities and often refer surgical cases.
charges_to_patients: Initial consultations $20, although no patients are turned away for lack of funds.
sponsoring_organization: Christian Vision Eye Services to Haiti

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice
mission_comments: The clinic has two medical doctors, one dentist and four nurses. Project Haiti Heart is currently working to expand it into a referring cardiovascular center for all of Haiti. Pt. who needs heart surgery will be sent across the border to PHH cardiovascular surgery center in the Dominican border town of Jimani (not yet completed).
charges_to_patients: The fee for a visit is 10 gourdes ( 25 cents) per visit and for those who can't pay, the visit is free.

specialties: Emergency Medicine, Family or General Practice, Pediatrics
mission_comments: Partnered with Humanity First USA and Haitian Christian Mission the clinic provides basic health care services to the extended Seguin community.

specialties: Family or General Practice, Pediatrics
mission_comments: The clinic is open Monday through Friday and is staffed with 3 nurses, a lab technician and a pharmacist.

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice, General Surgery
mission_comments: The clinic is staffed with a resident doctor, nurses, aides, lab technicians, administrative personnel, dentist and dental assistant who provide excellent medical care for the students, teachers, farm workers and patients from the surrounding communities. A regular rotation of volunteer surgical teams come from the United States to do major operations and specialized surgeries scheduled by the clinic
charges_to_patients: approximately $1.oo

specialties: Family or General Practice
mission_comments: The clinic offers basic medical care and is staffed with a nurse, a laboratory technician, and a local physician visits several mornings each week.

mission_comments: Large emergency room capacity and orthopaedic surgical care. Stabilized patients are moved to Pacot Center for rehab. Also has separate four bed facility for in-patient victims of sexual violence.Victims of rape should come here for treatment within 72 hours after the attack to receive prophylactic antiretroviral treatment and antibiotics against other STDs.
charges_to_patients: None.

specialties: General Surgery, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, Physical Therapy, Urology

charges_to_patients: Though fee-for-service, prices are low because the team is committed to serving all classes and levels of Haitian people.

specialties: Anesthesiology, General Surgery, Infectious Disease, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Orthopedic Surgery
mission_comments: CCH is working with MSPP to send rotating US health professionals each month to train Haitian health professionals in advanced surgical procedures, anesthesiology, infection control, patient care, biomedical repair and other health-related topics. CCH is installing a more advanced operating room and primary care equipment.

specialties: Cervical cancer screening, Gynecological Surgery, Obstetrics and Gynecology

specialties: Family or General Practice

Hospital operating only as a clinic at this writing(10/2008), with one full-time GP. Cardiologist on Wed.Dr Alexis, long time Int Med there Tues/Thurs. lLab and radiology open, EKG lab. No pharmacy, no ORs no OB and delivery. HSC does host medical missions.
charges_to_patients: Many cannot pay for this care, and their fees are waived or reduced.

specialties: Orthotist, Physical Therapy, Prosthetic Services, Rehabilitation Medicine
mission_comments: Prosthetika built a self-contained prosthetic workshop into two 20 foot steel shipping containers on grounds of Adventist Hospital in Diquini, P-au-P. The workshop contains all the necessary power equipment, tools, work stations, and facilities for manufacturing prosthetic and orthotic devices. The workshop facilitates fabrication of artificial limbs and orthopedic braces, as well as serves as a training facility for training local Haitian technicians.

organization: Catholic Church of St. Monica Haiti Twinning Program

In June, clinic usually have a radiologist with a portable ultrasound and a cardiologist to read ECHO's.

specialties: Dentistry, Family or General Practice, General Surgery, HIV Treatment, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Ophthalmology, Pediatrics
mission_comments: This is a full-time mission with family practice year-round. The director of the hospital, Dr. Guy Theodore, is a general surgeon who practices part-time, in addition to his general duties as director of the hospital.
charges_to_patients: Pignon is a charity hospital. No one is turned away if he/she cannot afford to pay. However, if a person can afford to pay, a small fee will be charged.
sponsoring_organization: Promise for Haiti (formerly Christian Mission of Pignon)

specialties: Family or General Practice, HIV Treatment, Tuberculosis Treatment
facility_location: Hopital Notre Dame de la Nativite
mission_comments: Primary care clinic with some surgical capacity. It is a permanent public facility. Surgical trips, if any, are coordinated through the Boston PIH office. Specialists (surgery, obgyn, pediatrics, opthalmology, infectious disease, etc.) are based mostly at H
charges_to_patients: No one is turned away if he/she cannot afford to pay.

mission_comments: Trauma and rehabilitation hospital with CT scanner and NICU/PICU. Operated with Project Medishare.

specialties: Ophthalmology, Otolaryngology
Family or General Practice, General Surgery, Orthopedic Surgery, Orthopedics, Pediatric Surgery, Pediatrics, Plastic Surgery
mission_comments: The Lambert Sante Free Clinic is supported by the Real Medicine Foundation (RMF). The clinic provides emergency trauma care and care of complications from trauma, as well as orthopedic and reconstructive surgery.

specialties: Dentistry, Emergency Medicine, Family or General Practice, General Surgery, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics, Vaccinations
mission_comments: A 20-bed facility with a 24-hour emergency room and operating room. Serves a population of 45,000 rural poor. Services include inpatient and outreach to auxiliary clinic in Savane Henri. Also hosts U.S. surgical teams 4 times per year (general surgery).

specialties: Family or General Practice, Lab Services
mission_comments: Includes a laboratory, a pharmacy and a HIV Screening Center. Quality medical care is available from doctors,nurses and therapists experienced in the areas of Ob-gyn, Pre and Postnatal Care, Gynecology and Pediatrics.

specialties: Family or General Practice, Lab Services, Psychiatry
facility_location: Fondation Bienfaisance Centre Medical Martissant 7 --Gabriel Vital
mission_comments: Includes a laboratory, a pharmacy and a HIV Screening Center. Quality medical care is available from doctors,nurses and therapists experienced in the areas of Ob-gyn, Pre and Postnatal Care, Gynecology and Pediatrics. Also offers mental health services.

specialties: Obstetrics and Gynecology
mission_comments: The Fort St. Michel Clinic is run in cooperation with Konbit Sante and Justinian Hospital. The clinic specializes in obstetrics and gynecology as well as other women's health services.

specialties: Anesthesiology, Cardiology, Dentistry, Dermatology, Endocrinology, Family or General Practice, Psychiatry
facility_location: Good Samaritan Hospital (Hospital General El Buen Samaritano)
mission_comments: January to March 2006, Good Samaritan has access to a pediatric urologist on Mondays. It has two state of the art surgery rooms, including being equipped for arthroscopy and eye surgery. Good Sam has the only dialysis treatment ward east of the capital of Santo Domingo.
charges_to_patients: Costs are very reasonable. No one is turned away who can't afford care, but generally everyone is expected to pay something. Inclusive charges are usually 500 pesos for surgery from someone from a surrounding batey and 2000 pesos for someone from the city
location_information: ['Good Samaritan Hospital (Hospital General El Buen Samaritano)', 'La Romana', 'La Romana', 'Dominican Republic']

specialties: Emergency Medicine, Family or General Practice, General Surgery, Internal Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics
mission_comments: Nurse practitioners help alongside doctors to screen, diagnose and treat patients. Emergency cases are handled day or night with a doctor on call at all times.

specialties: Audiology, Dentistry, Family or General Practice, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Optometry, Pediatrics, Vaccinations
mission_comments: Basic Primary Care, wide range of services. Also host supplementary nutrition program and some vocational training services.
charges_to_patients: minimal (currently 30 lempiras for consult and medicines)

specialties: Family or General Practice, Obstetrics and Gynecology
mission_comments: 40 bed hospital with full-time Haitian doctor, 2 Cuban GPs and 2 Haitian residents. Looking for missionary general surgeon. Basic ultrasound for OB, basic labs and xray too.
charges_to_patients: Emergency care is provided to those who need it regardless of ability to pay. Elective surgery is paid in advance. If a patient is unable to pay for medications or services there is a fund to help them with their care.

mission_comments: 320 beds; opening mid-2012; includes advanced diagnostic and surgery facilities;pediatric oncology; neonatal unit;ICU.
